locations.subtitle: Define where your items are stored

customPrompt.title: Custom AI Instructions
customPrompt.description: Provide additional context to help the AI better identify your item. For example, specify naming conventions like 'bin X,Y' or provide specific details about the item.
customPrompt.placeholder: e.g., 'This is a bin from a storage rack. Label bins using the format Row-Column (e.g., A1, B3)'

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.subtitle: Get personalized suggestions based on your inventory
aiAssistant.emptyStateTitle: How can I help you today?
aiAssistant.emptyStateDescription: Ask me anything about your inventory. I can help with planting schedules, craft project ideas, organization tips, and more.
aiAssistant.placeholder: Ask me anything about your inventory...
aiAssistant.creditCost: {cost, plural, one {# credit} other {# credits}} per query
aiAssistant.deleteSessionMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This cannot be undone.

examples.plantingSchedule: Create a planting schedule for my seeds
examples.craftProjects: Suggest craft projects using my supplies
examples.organizationTips: How can I organize my inventory better?
examples.shoppingList: What items am I running low on?

billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your AI credits and billing
billing.insufficientCreditsMessage: You don't have enough credits to perform this action.
billing.creditsExplanation: Credits power HomERP's AI features. Different AI operations cost varying amounts of credits to cover AI processing costs. Credits are deducted from your balance each time you use an AI feature.
billing.signupCreditsDescription: New accounts receive free credits as a one-time signup bonus. These credits never expire and can be used anytime.
billing.creditCostInfoDescription: Each AI feature uses credits based on its processing complexity:
billing.identifyItem: Identify Item ({cost, plural, one {# credit} other {# credits}})
billing.identifyItemCost: Identify Item ({cost, plural, one {# credit} other {# credits}})
billing.identifyItemCostMultiple: Identify Item ({count, plural, one {# credit} other {# credits}})
billing.reclassifyCost: Re-classify ({cost, plural, one {# credit} other {# credits}})

systemProfile.minValueKeepDescription: Keep items worth more than this regardless of usage
systemProfile.profileDescriptionDescription: Describe yourself to help AI understand your needs
systemProfile.profileDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., I'm an electronics hobbyist who builds custom keyboards and repairs vintage audio equipment...
systemProfile.purgeAggressivenessDescription: How aggressively should AI suggest purging items?
systemProfile.aggressivenessConservativeDescription: Only suggest items that are clearly unused
systemProfile.configureProfile: Configure your profile to get personalized AI recommendations

gridfinity.title: Storage Planner
gridfinity.subtitle: Plan your Gridfinity storage layouts
gridfinity.gridfinityDescription: Gridfinity is a modular, open-source storage system using a standard 42mm grid. Create storage units and plan where items go with drag-and-drop.
gridfinity.createUnitDescription: Define the dimensions of your storage container to calculate the grid size.
gridfinity.deleteUnitConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? All item placements will be removed.
gridfinity.createFirst: Create your first Gridfinity storage unit to start planning
gridfinity.dragToPlace: Drag items onto the grid to place them
gridfinity.autoLayoutPartialError: Placed {success} items, but {failed} failed to place

placementDialog.title: Select Bin Size
placementDialog.overlapWarning: This size would overlap with an existing bin. Choose a smaller size.

editPlacementDialog.title: Edit Bin Size
editPlacementDialog.description: Adjust the bin size for this placement
editPlacementDialog.overlapWarning: This size would overlap with another bin. Choose a smaller size.

labels.previewError: Failed to generate preview. Please try again.
labels.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups to print labels, or use Download instead.

storagePlanner.createDescription: Set up a new storage planning system to organize your inventory items with precision placement and visual planning tools.

selectType.title: Choose Your Storage System
selectType.description: Different storage systems work best for different use cases. Select the type that matches your physical storage setup.
selectType.helpText: Not sure which to choose? Gridfinity is great for drawers and toolboxes, while pegboards work well for wall-mounted tool organization.

configuration.title: Configure Your Storage
configuration.description: Set up the dimensions and details for your {type}. Measure your physical container to ensure accurate grid planning.

review.title: Review Your Configuration
review.description: Confirm your storage setup before creating. You can edit these settings later if needed.
review.comingSoonDescription: This storage type is not yet available. Please select Gridfinity to proceed.

gridfinity.title: Gridfinity
gridfinity.description: The popular open-source modular storage system. Perfect for organizing small parts, tools, and components in drawers and containers.
gridfinity.longDescription: Gridfinity uses a standardized 42mm grid system that allows you to mix and match bins of different sizes. Plan exactly where each item goes, then 3D print bins to fit.

multiboard.title: Multiboard / Pegboard / Honeycomb
multiboard.description: Wall-mounted modular storage with hooks and accessories. Ideal for frequently-used tools and supplies.
multiboard.longDescription: Plan your wall storage layout before drilling a single hole. Visualize hook placements and ensure you have room for all your tools.
multiboard.comingSoonDescription: We're working on adding support for Multiboard, Pegboard, and Honeycomb wall storage systems. Check back soon!

toteRack.title: Storage Tote Rack
toteRack.description: Organize bins and totes on shelving units. Track what's in each bin with a visual map of your storage rack.
toteRack.longDescription: Create a digital map of your shelving system. Know exactly which bin contains what, and generate labels to mark each position.
toteRack.comingSoonDescription: We're working on adding support for storage tote rack systems. Check back soon!

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.subtitle: Share your inventory with family or team members
collaboration.noCollaboratorsDescription: Invite family members or team members to help manage your inventory
collaboration.noSharedInventoriesDescription: You haven't been invited to any shared inventories yet
collaboration.viewerDescription: Can view items, categories, and locations
collaboration.editorDescription: Can create and edit items, categories, and locations
collaboration.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this shared inventory?
collaboration.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from your inventory?
collaboration.alreadyInvited: This email has already been invited
